resultTable.sql:
insert overwrite table ${result_db}.dm_ct_fm_alarm partition(p_date='${p_date}')
select orgAlarmId as org_alarm_id, alarmId as alarm_id, eventTime as event_time, clearTime as clear_time, severity as severity, alarmType as alarm_type, clearFlag as clear_flag, objectId as object_id, objectName as object_name, objectType as object_type, IP as object_ip, locateObjectId as locate_object_id, locateObjectName as locate_object_name, locateObjectType as locate_object_type, locateInfo as locate_info, vendorName as vendor_name, alarmTitle as alarm_title, probableCause as probable_cause, maintainPropose as maintain_propose, domain as domain, totalCount as total_count, EnodebID as enodeb_id, CellID as eci, resourceStatus as resource_status, PROVINCE_ID as province_id, PROVINCE_DESC as province_name, REGION_ID as region_id, REGION_DESC as region_name from ${source_db}.ç”¨æˆ·æä¾ where p_date>='${p_date_start}' and p_date<'${p_date_end}'
